standard.description: These tests describe general best practices to keep things tidy (housekeeping)

test.query_clob:
with std as (
    select case when months_between (sysdate, apc.last_updated_on) > svt_preferences.get('SVT_CLEANUP_DELAY')
                then case when apc.condition_type = 'Never'
                          then 'NEVERPAGECOMP'
                          end
                end child_code,
           apc.condition_type,
           apc.application_id,
           apc.page_id,
           apc.computation element_name,
           apc.last_updated_by,
           apc.last_updated_on,
           apc.build_option,
           abo.build_option_status,
           abo.status_on_export,
	         apc.workspace
    from apex_application_page_comp apc 
    inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.application_id = apc.application_id
                                          and aap.page_id = apc.page_id
    left outer join apex_application_build_options abo on abo.application_id = aap.application_id 
                                                       and abo.build_option_name = aap.build_option
    where apc.workspace = svt_preferences.get('SVT_WORKSPACE')
	  and coalesce(abo.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
)
select case when std.child_code is null 
            then 'Y'
            else 'N'
            end pass_yn,
       std.application_id,
       std.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       std.last_updated_by,
       std.last_updated_on,
       case when std.child_code is not null 
            then apex_string.format('%0 (page %1, app %2) should be made available or deleted. It has been unavailable since `%4`',
                          p0 => case when std.child_code = 'NEVERPAGEBRANCH'
                                     then 'Branch with Never condition `'||std.element_name||'`'
                                     when std.child_code = 'NEVERPAGECOMP'
                                     then 'Computation with Never condition `'||std.element_name||'`'
                                     when std.child_code = 'NEVERPAGEDA'
                                     then 'Dynamic Action with Never condition `'||std.element_name||'`'
                                     end,
                          p1 => std.page_id,
                          p2 => std.application_id,
                          p4 => to_char(std.last_updated_on, 'DD-MON-YY')
                        ) 
            end validation_failure_message,
       case when std.child_code is not null 
            then apex_string.format('%0 (page %1, app %2) has been unavailable for too long',
                          p0 => case when std.child_code = 'NEVERPAGEBRANCH'
                                     then 'Branch with Never condition `'||std.element_name||'`'
                                     end,
                          p1 => std.page_id,
                          p2 => std.application_id,
                          p4 => to_char(std.last_updated_on, 'DD-MON-YY')
                        ) 
            end issue_title,
	     std.child_code,
       std.element_name,
			 std.page_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
			 std.workspace
from std
test.explanation: NEVERPAGECOMP : Page computations that have had their Server-Side Condition set to "Never" (for whatever reason), should be removed. Including these items/regions just creates unnecessary app bloat.
